cause.description:
The name says it all. Is a description really necessary?
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ek1K6TYssa4
Note: All donations will go towards supporting our troops
1. Rosie O'Donnell must shut the fuck up immediately for the betterment of society as a whole
cause.mission: To revoke Ms. O'Donnell's right to free speech. Actually, just put some duct tape over her mouth.
cause.name: Official Petition to get Rosie O'Donnell to Shut the Fuck Up
